Before starting selling, you will need to set up your Shop in POS. Our official guide will take you through this step by step:
POS Configuration

li.p: Setting Up Products:
Add new candy products in the Inventory App.
Define product attributes such as Brand and categorize them by Type (e.g., Gummies, Chocolates, Hard Candy).
Enable weight-based pricing for pick & mix candy by setting the unit of measure to grams or kilograms (Point of Sale > Three dot menu > IoT Box > Electronic Scale).
Pricing by Weight:
Create a product with a unit of measure set to grams/kilograms.
Odoo will calculate the price automatically based on the weight entered at checkout.
Automating with a Scale:
For full automation, connect a scale to your POS system using an IoT Box.
The POS system will automatically read the weight and calculate the price.
Processing Payments:
Accept multiple payment options: cash, card, and mobile payments.
Generate printed or digital receipts for customers.

template.p: Keeping your candy store stocked is crucial, and Odoo makes it easy to manage supplier relationships and automate purchasing.

li.p: Creating a Supplier List:
Store vendor details in the Purchase App.
Assign suppliers to specific brands or product types.
Placing Purchase Orders:
Generate purchase orders directly from the Purchase App.
Set up Reordering Rules to automatically replenish stock when it gets low.
Track supplier lead times to prevent delays in stock replenishment.
Receiving Deliveries:
When stock arrives, record the incoming shipment in the Inventory App.
Verify quantities and update stock levels automatically.
